SAINT.Name: Synaxis of the 'Three Hierarchs' - Basil the Great, Gregory the Theologian and John Chrysostom
The feast of the Three Hierarchs is transferred to Tuesday
The feast of the Three Hierarchs is transferred to Thursday
Translation of the relics of the Hieromartyr Ignatius the Godbearer, Bishop of Antioch [from Thursday] (+ 107)
Hieromartyr Hipolytus, Pope of Rome, along with the Martyrs Censorinus and Sabinus, the Virginmartyr Chryse and 20 other Martyrs at Ostia (3rd C)
Martyr Theophilus the New in Cyprus (+ 784)
Venerable Zeno, the Faster of the Caves of Kiev (14th C)
Venerable Zeno (Xeno) the Hermit of Antioch, a diciple of Saint Basil the Great (5th C)
